<item>
<title><![CDATA[Sajjan asks Trudeau to meet with Indian politician behind Sikh separatist accusations]]></title>
<link>https://www.theglobeandmail.com/news/politics/sajjan-asks-trudeau-to-meet-with-indian-politician-behind-sikh-separatist-accusations/article38015085/?cmpid=rss1</link>
<description><![CDATA[Punjab Chief Minister Amarinder Singh has repeatedly said that he believes several members of Trudeau’s cabinet are sympathetic to Sikh separatists]]></description>
<pubDate>Sun, 18 Feb 2018 11:15:05 -0500</pubDate>
<guid isPermaLink="false">38015085</guid>
<dc:creator><![CDATA[]]></dc:creator>
</item>
<item>
<title><![CDATA[NDP policy convention takes party back to its leftist roots ahead of 2019 federal election]]></title>
<link>https://www.theglobeandmail.com/news/politics/ndp-policy-convention-takes-party-back-to-its-leftist-roots-ahead-of-2019-federal-election/article38014578/?cmpid=rss1</link>
<description><![CDATA[A large number of the resolutions that were debated by the roughly 2,000 New Democrats who are in Ottawa were aimed at closing the gap between rich and poor, between privileged and underprivileged.]]></description>
<pubDate>Sat, 17 Feb 2018 16:38:04 -0500</pubDate>
<guid isPermaLink="false">38014578</guid>
<dc:creator><![CDATA[GLORIA GALLOWAY]]></dc:creator>
</item>
<item>
<title><![CDATA[Patrick Brown shows it’s all about him, no matter the collateral damage to Ontario PCs]]></title>
<link>https://www.theglobeandmail.com/opinion/patrick-brown-shows-its-all-about-him-no-matter-the-collateral-damage-to-ontario-pcs/article38013963/?cmpid=rss1</link>
<description><![CDATA[The governance of 13 million people in Ontario is at stake. It’s time to for the former leader to grow up and act in the best interest of his party.]]></description>
<pubDate>Fri, 16 Feb 2018 21:07:32 -0500</pubDate>
<guid isPermaLink="false">38013963</guid>
<dc:creator><![CDATA[ADAM RADWANSKI]]></dc:creator>
</item>
<item>
<title><![CDATA[Canada urged to take more action after sanctioning Myanmar general for Rohingya abuses]]></title>
<link>https://www.theglobeandmail.com/news/politics/canada-urged-to-take-more-action-after-sanctioning-myanmar-general-for-rohingya-abuses/article38013037/?cmpid=rss1</link>
<description><![CDATA[Major-General Maung Maung Soe is the 53rd person to be targeted by Canada’s Magnitsky law, which allows the government to impose asset freezes and travel bans on human-rights violators.]]></description>
<pubDate>Fri, 16 Feb 2018 19:52:11 -0500</pubDate>
<guid isPermaLink="false">38013037</guid>
<dc:creator><![CDATA[MICHELLE ZILIO]]></dc:creator>
</item>
<item>
<title><![CDATA[Morneau analyzing big U.S. tax cuts, rules out ‘impulsive’ Canadian response]]></title>
<link>https://www.theglobeandmail.com/news/politics/morneau-analyzing-big-us-tax-cuts-rules-out-impulsive-canadian-response/article38012764/?cmpid=rss1</link>
<description><![CDATA[The federal Finance Minister says he is considering the issue but signalled that companies should not expect a corporate tax reduction when he delivers his February budget.]]></description>
<pubDate>Fri, 16 Feb 2018 19:36:28 -0500</pubDate>
<guid isPermaLink="false">38012764</guid>
<dc:creator><![CDATA[BILL CURRY AND DAVID PARKINSON]]></dc:creator>
</item>
<item>
<title><![CDATA[Some New Democrats call for halt of Trans Mountain expansion as Alberta, B.C. premiers battle]]></title>

<dc:creator><![CDATA[GLORIA GALLOWAY]]></dc:creator>

<item>
<title><![CDATA[Tommy Banks, 81, was a musical virtuoso, TV star and passionate Edmontonian who became a senator]]></title>
<link>https://www.theglobeandmail.com/arts/music/tommy-banks-81-was-a-jazz-virtuoso-and-passionate-edmontonian-who-became-a-senator/article38011681/?cmpid=rss1</link>
<description><![CDATA[Throughout his life, whether hosting a TV show, playing music or starting a new business, he was a staunch supporter of Edmonton]]></description>
<pubDate>Fri, 16 Feb 2018 18:29:07 -0500</pubDate>
<guid isPermaLink="false">38011681</guid>
<dc:creator><![CDATA[SUSAN FERRIER MacKAY]]></dc:creator>
</item>
<item>
<title><![CDATA[The threat to democracy? It’s on our screens]]></title>
<link>https://www.theglobeandmail.com/opinion/the-threat-to-democracy-its-on-yourscreen/article38009392/?cmpid=rss1</link>
<description><![CDATA[Foreign actors are attempting to digitally disrupt our elections and political systems. But this is only half the problem. The other half of the problem is … us.]]></description>
<pubDate>Fri, 16 Feb 2018 15:44:25 -0500</pubDate>
<guid isPermaLink="false">38009392</guid>
<dc:creator><![CDATA[ELIZABETH RENZETTI]]></dc:creator>
</item>
